item.title: CVS
item.description: score:5 Chances: CVS launches Cordavis to target the biosimilar market. CVS Health’s efforts to market and co-produce biosimilar medicines. CVS stock potential rebound after recent drop. Positive growth potential in biosimilars sector. Investor opportunity after market cap drop. Risks: CVS Health’s Q2 earnings crashed 37%.
